sQuestion: A student has scores of 68 , 75 , and 69 on his first 3 tests. He needs an average of at least 70 to earn a grade of C. What is the minimum score that the student needs on the 4th test to ensure a C?

sentences.sentence: A student has scores of 68 , 75 , and 69 on his first 3 tests.
He needs an average of at least 70 to earn a grade of C.
What is the minimum score that the student needs on the 4th test to ensure a C?
